amendment.description: Amendment allows funds authorized in the bill to be used to pay for tuition and fees for NASA employees to attend programs of the International Space University held in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to permit funds authorized in the bill to pay tuition and fees for NASA employees to attend programs of the International Space University held in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
